radio_info.short: Icengelo" is a Bemba word which means Light. Hence, Radio Icengelo is Radio Light. It is owned by the Catholic Diocese of Ndola and was
radio_info.rest:
established in 1995. it transmits on 89.1 and 102.9MHz and broadcasts
in English , Bemba and Lamba. The radius of coverage is 130 square
kilometers. Hence , Radio Icengelo covers the entire Copperbelt
Province and the surrounding areas.

radios.title: Radio Christian Voice
radios.profile_slogan: Here to minister to your Spirit, Soul and Body!

radio_info.short: Radio Christian Voice is an independent Christian Station, located in Lusaka, Zambia, that has been broadcasting to central and southern Africa since 1994 . Its
radio_info.rest: aim is to reach all nations with the Gospel of Jesus Christ, through quality Christian contemporary music and programming. They want to reach people through programming that is current, up to date and relevant to them. They want to be the home of the best Christian music and programming, a place where people find great music, good company and a message of hope.

radios.profile_slogan: The mission of Yatsani Radio is to spread God's love through unity and peace

radio_info.short: The Catholic community radio station of the Lusaka Archdiocese Mainly parish volunteers with no previous broadcasting experience and receiving no payment whatsoever for our work
radio_info.rest:
with Yatsani Radio
People who believe that Christianity is practical and all-embracing
Independent of any political party and of Party politics
Concerned with the growth of the whole person, independent of colour, race, creed or gender
Promoters of peace, justice and unity through upholding what is good, true and beautiful
Broadcasting since 1st July 1999.
Under the special patronage of Saints Peter and Paul, who seem to have appointed themselves to the job!
